DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate impact electro-acupuncture pain processing patient fibromyalgia ( FM ) . The investigator hypothesize electro-acupuncture effective FM function desensitization therapy , apply repeatedly multiple treatment session , gradually habituate nervous system continue pain sensory signaling .
DOC.brief_title: Neuroimaging Approaches Deconstructing Acupuncture Chronic Pain
DOC.detailed_description: This study design two component : 1 ) cross sectional assessment brain chemistry , connectivity response pain healthy control age- sex-matched fibromyalgia patient , 2 ) longitudinal assessment outcome fibromyalgia patient randomize either electro-acupuncture laser acupuncture . The investigator evaluate 80 fibromyalgia patient receive acupuncture treatment twice week 4 week , total 8 treatment . Baseline data patient compare result 20 pain-free control . Participants undergo experimental pain assessment well brain neuroimaging .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Fibromyalgia Participants Have Fibromyalgia diagnosis least one year also meet Wolfe et al 2011 criterion Fibromyalgia . Continued presence pain 50 % day . Pain great certain threshold Visual Analog Scale ( VAS ) pain ; 7day recall ; [ Note : The VAS widely use clinical pain research chose use inclusion criterion clinical pain assessment . Within group numerical rating scale 0100 commonly use quantitative sensory assessment , choose use NRS scale evoke pain assessment . ] Willing limit introduction new medication treatment modality control FM symptom study . Able travel study site receive acupuncture treatment two time weekly . Over 18 65 year age . Righthanded . Female . Capable give write informed consent . Inclusion Criteria Healthy Control Participants Over 18 65 year age . Female . Righthanded . Do fibromyalgia associate pain disorder , include : migraine , temporomandibular joint disorder ( TMJ ) , chronic pelvic pain ( CPP ) , chronic fatigue syndrome ( CFS ) . Pain less certain threshold Visual Analog Scale ( VAS ) pain ; 7day recall Willing complete study procedure . Capable give write informed consent . Exclusion Criteria Fibromyalgia Participants : Acupuncture within last 6months . Presence known coagulation abnormality , thrombocytopenia , bleed diathesis may preclude safe use acupuncture . Presence concurrent autoimmune inflammatory disease rheumatoid arthritis , systemic lupus erythematosus , inflammatory bowel disease , etc. , chronic pain condition pain great fibromyalgia pain . Peripheral neuropathy know cause interfere activity daily live . History vascular surgery lower limbs current low limb vascular dysfunction . History head injury substantial loss consciousness . Routine daily use narcotic analgesic , marijuana history substance abuse past 24 month determine subject selfreport . Stimulant medication , use treat ADD/ADHD ( e.g. , amphetamine/ dextroamphetamine [ Adderall® ] , methylphenidate , dextroamphetamine ) , fatigue associate sleep apnea shift work ( e.g. , modafinil ) , exclude . Concurrent participation therapeutic trial . Pregnant nursing . Severe psychiatric illness ( current schizophrenia , major depression suicidal ideation , substance abuse within two year ) . Contraindications fcMRI , fMRI , 1HMRS method . These may include limited : surgical clip , surgical staple , metal implant , certain metallic dental material . [ Note : formal description contraindication MRI present DSM Plan ] . Use counter pain medication ( NSAIDs , etc . ) day MRI scan . Use need narcotic pain medication 48 hour prior MRI scan . Current , habitual , previous use within last 12 month artificial nail , nail enhancement , nail extension cover portion either thumbnail . Exceptions , include brief and/or occasional use , may permissible discretion principle investigator . Any impairment , activity situation judgment Study Coordinator Principal Investigator would prevent satisfactory completion study protocol .
